sql-select.name: GetInstanceBufferCacheHitRatio
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT GETDATE() AS [EventTime] ,CONVERT([BIGINT], tSDOPC.[cntr_value]) AS [BufferCacheHitRatio] ,CONVERT([BIGINT], b.[cntr_value]) AS [BufferCacheHitRatioBase] ,CASE WHEN (CONVERT([BIGINT], b.[cntr_value]) > CONVERT([BIGINT], 0)) THEN (CONVERT([FLOAT], tSDOPC.[cntr_value]) / CONVERT([FLOAT], b.[cntr_value])) * 100.0 ELSE NULL END AS [BufferCacheHitRatioPercent] FROM [sys].[dm_os_performance_counters] tSDOPC INNER JOIN [sys].[dm_os_performance_counters] b ON b.[object_name] = tSDOPC.[object_name] WHERE tSDOPC.[object_name] LIKE N'%:Buffer Manager%' AND tSDOPC.[counter_name] = N'Buffer cache hit ratio' AND b.[counter_name] = N'Buffer cache hit ratio base' AND CONVERT([BIGINT], b.[cntr_value]) > CONVERT([BIGINT], 0) AND CONVERT([BIGINT], b.[cntr_value]) >= CONVERT([BIGINT], tSDOPC.[cntr_value]) ;
